course_description: Expands students; Russian literary vocabulary and develops their ability to express themselves on both literary and everyday issues. Emphasizes the stylistic patterns of 19th and 20th-century Russian writers and enhances students' understanding of the cultural ambience of Russian literature.
sections: Class Nbr: 2763, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: E. Glazov-Corrigan, Status: Open
